house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 4 bedroom(s), 5 bath(s) , 4 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Bidet, Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/VaultedCeilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Intercom System,Microwave, Pantry, Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
